snippet.title: Final Fury - Announcement Trailer | Coming to All Major VR Platforms in 2024
snippet.description:
Kluge Interactive, the studio that brought you Synth Riders, announces Final Fury, a classic arcade fighting game reimagined for VR!

Join the Newsletter @ http://finalfuryvr.com to be first to hear about upcoming news, updates and receive your free wallpapers to stylize your desktop or mobile device!

Coming in 2024, this is Kluge’s next title, taking the solid mechanics and furious pace of a classic arcade fighting game, reimagined as an immersive VR experience and optimized for multiplayer 1v1 fights. The game is set to release on all major VR platforms.

----

Follow @finalfuryvr on all social media!
#finalfury #synthriders #vr
